message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something we could work with?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to say, I'm a bit attached to the product and was hoping to get a better price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9500?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable going that low. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10800. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9800?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob. I've already made significant concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to make one more offer, and that's $10500. This is my last offer, so I hope we can finally come to an agreement.
I understand you're frustrated, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Would you be willing to consider $9900?

I've had enough of this back-and-forth, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than I already have. I'm willing to make one more offer, and that's $10200. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm walking away from the deal.
